name: In the Cards (GamesOgre)
description:
A small roguelike made where the enemies can cast the same spells as you... but watch out, if you're unlucky they might even have a better deck!

Progress through the rooms of the wicked and haunted Dice Tower in the hopes of defeating the evil chonky boi (and maybe even his clone) as you face off against a variety of different enemies that could well have the same powers as you.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Left Click to cast top card in left deck
  • Right Click to cast top card in right deck

Made with love by:

  • Sam  - Lead Development
  • Ste - Part-time Development
  • Brendan - Artist
  • Sean - Ideas man & QA
